WorkItem.Description:
In Excel, when one types ALT+"Enter", this automatically turns on wrap text for the cell.
 
AdvancedValueBinder.php is expected to show similar behavior.
 
Example:
---
require_once 'PHPExcel/Cell/AdvancedValueBinder.php';
PHPExcel_Cell::setValueBinder( new PHPExcel_Cell_AdvancedValueBinder() );
 
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getCell('A1')->setValue("hello\nworld");
 
Expected result:
----
Text is wrapped in cell A1
 
Actual result:
----
Text is not wrapped in cell A1
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.2
WorkItem.Summary: AdvancedValueBinder.php: Automatically wrap text when there is new line in string (ALT+"Enter")
